title: Baby Care & Dress Up Kids Game
creator: TabTale

extendedInfo.description: Dress Up, Feed & Bathe your Baby - Have a Tea Party & Put your Baby to Bed! Play Mommy & Care for Adorable Babies, Hundreds of Dressup Outfits & Loads of Fashion Fun! Fashion Meets Babysitting in an Awesome Mommyâs Helper Game - Donât Let the Babies Cry!Meet Emma,Olivia, Sophia and Ava, four adorable baby girls who canât wait to be dressed up, fed, played with at a doll tea party, bathed, read a bedtime story and put to sleep. This is the most fantastic mommyâs helper, dressup, fashion game ever!â Dress Up Time!First, itâs time to dressup your baby girl in style. Choose from dozens of hairstyles, outfits, onesies, dresses, jeans, silly pacifiers, accessories and toys! Your fashion plate baby is now hungry and ready to eat.â Feed Me!Hey kids, your baby is hungry. Itâs time to feed her. Kids will prepare the bottle and feed their baby her cereal and veggies. Is your baby a picky eater? When sheâs happy, she will smile, but if sheâs hungry or doesnât like her food, watch out - she will cry. Remember to clean your babyâs mouth with a napkin!â Tea Party!Everyone loves a fun tea party, and your baby is so excited. Surrounded by her dolls in her backyard, your baby girl is ready to eat cookies and drink tea with her dolls. Kids will mix up the tea and add sugar cubes. Donât forget to give the dolls drinks too. And those cookies taste yummy! Now itâs time for a bath.â Bath Time!Get out the shampoo and soap, your baby is dirty. Wipe her clean with a sponge. Make the bubbles pop and play with her bath toys. You will rinse her off with water when sheâs all clean. Sheâs nice and clean and ready for a bedtime story.â Time for Bed!After all the fun she had, your baby is getting sleepy. She wants a bottle and a bedtime story. All tucked in and ready for bed, kids will choose from 3 books to read to her. Nightie night, sweet girl.Whatâs Inside Baby Care & Dress Up - Play, Love and Have Fun with Babiesâ 52 shirts & dresses - a fashion heaven!â 35 pairs of fun & fancy socksâ 31 pants, jeans, skirts overalls and fashion bloomersâ 21 bracelets, necklaces and watches, 21 hairstylesâ 39 funky hats, 30 fashion sunglassesâ 34 pacifiers, mustaches, faces & moreâ 35 pairs of crazy and fun shoes, sandals, bootsâ 25 toys, wagons, baby carriages, balls & moreBaby Care & Dress Up - Play, Love and Have Fun with Babies Featuresâ Touch the spoon and scoop the formula to make the babyâs bottleâ The bottle shakes until itâs mixed and ready to be usedâ Feed the baby her cereal, vegetables & fruit and make her smile or cryâ Make the tea yourself from 4 flavors, add some sugar and serve!â Choose bedtime stories to read, âCinderella,â âWizard of Ozâ or âGoldilocksââ Use the soap and sponge to clean your baby, then wash & dry her with the towelKids love caring for babies and playing mommy. The baby care dressup game is the most interactive mommyâs helper game for young kids.WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACKParents and kids are our best reviewers and help us create and improve our apps. We always welcome your suggestions, comments and thoughts. If you have a moment, feel free to rate and review our app. Please note that we aren't able to respond to reviews in the Google Play store, but we'd love to get your feedback to our email: support@TabTale.comABOUT TabTaleSearch âTabTaleâ on Google Play and discover more incredible apps for young kids. TabTaleâs smart games provide an exciting, interactive, and rich educational experience. Filled with innovative and engaging activities, each application inspires creativity and imagination in a way that is uniquely enjoyable and stimulating. Let the games begin! More games are coming soon....Join our Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/TabTaleFollow us on Twitter: @TabTaleBy downloading this application you agree to the Terms of Use of TabTale Ltd. which are available to your review on http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use.NEED HELP?Contact us 24/7 with any questions or comments: support@TabTale.com

reviews.title: love it, amazing.

reviews.comment: It would be a better game if there wasn\'t ads at the bottom i can\'t even see some of the items. Then u got to pay to unlock babies so basically all u can do is dress up, feed & play with one baby!!!! Delete...i cant even let my 3yr old daughter play cause the ads

reviews.title: Ehh..
reviews.comment: This game isn\'t very good quality and in my opinion has very creepy costumes for the baby and noises the baby will make occasionally. I don\'t recommend this app.

reviews.title: avoid
reviews.comment: unplayable  due to adverts you have to pay to get rid of adverts and unlock other babies another case of developers getting friends relatives to give high scores   and i have reported this app,as no way should a childs game have adult adverts nor make it so easy as to pay for features
reviews.author: Shelina Aktar

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: This game is cool.I love this game because I can dress up a baby. I love babies.
reviews.author: Ciera King

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Really good game, especially for kids! You get to take care of your own baby like a real one! However, you are only able to access one baby. This doesn\'t really matter, as little kids don\'t know the difference, but you have to pay a ridiculous price, and kids could accidentally get involved with payment. Overall, great game!
reviews.author: Rebecca Bond

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I\'m a 11yrs old girl and really love lil kids... its suits me, I can use it when I want to play.. tnx for making this app
